Text: Expected Future Curve Demandbased on the email below it looks as if the curve demand for JuneJuly could be heavy based on the extensive review of international assets taking place in August FYI Gwyn Original Message From Hudler Cindy Sent Monday May AM To Raymond Maureen Cc Koepke Gwyn Subject Curve request Gwyn Did you receive my voice mail message regarding the monthly request for updates to the curves for the Brazil office I feel this should stand as a recurring monthly request as long as they hold the positions which must be revalued each month If I recall correctly they need FX IGPM CPI include monthly data PPI Finished Goods include monthly data PPI Industrial Commodities include monthly data What is your status on the preparation of these curves We will be revaluing assets extensively for the next BOD meeting August so I will prepare a list of curves needed for the next several months Please let me know about the curves for Riccardo Thanks again Cindy
